{u'Ref': u'MasterUsername'}: The user name associated with the master user account for the redshift cluster that is being created
The node type to be provisioned for the redshift cluster

The number of compute nodes in the redshift cluster. When cluster type is specified as: 1) single-node, the NumberOfNodes parameter should be specified as 1, 2) multi-node, the NumberOfNodes parameter should be greater than 1
